Name: Niflhel's Fables: The Book of Gypsies
About the game: A visual novel with a fabulous atmosphere where your every choice matters. Ruff and his brothers went to haymaking one day. His brothers punished him â€” do not lie down in the heat on the boundary under a broom bush. Did not listen to the brothers Ruff. This is where his misadventures began. 'Navi tales: the Book of Gypsies' is a visual novel, from the pages of which the midday summer heat is bursting. The setting is based on Slavic folklore. 'Navi Tales' is a prequel to another game of our studio - 'Navi Day'.
